pages.text: The Atmosburst Crystal is an elemental type crystal, representing air. Its name is a portmanteau of the words "atmospheric" and "burst". They can be used to summon a blast of air in their "Atmospheric Burst" mode, which can push all mobs, including players, away from you, at the cost of 5% potential, 10% insanity, and 1 $(l:reagents/advanced_reagent)Advanced Reagent$(/l).
